verbose_text: More importantly, high concentration of poly (vinyl alcohol) as an effective capping / stabilizing agent coupled with two sequential curing stages (i.e., firstly at a lower temperature and then at a higher temperature) promotes the stability of the PDMS precursor based emulsion droplet, and thus leads to the final smooth isolated PDMS microspheres.
evidence: alcohol) as an effective capping/stabilizing agent coupled with two sequential curing stages (i.e., firstly at a lower temperature and then at a higher temperature) promotes the stability of the PDMS precursor
